cx-desc: A tool that allows editors to translate pages from one language to another with the help of machine translation and other translation aids
cx-tools-instructions-text1: Add some paragraphs to the translation.
cx-tools-instructions-text2: Adjust the automatic translations provided to ensure quality
cx-tools-instructions-text3: Machine translation is a useful starting point for translations, but translators must revise errors as necessary and confirm that the translation is accurate.
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Do not translate text that appears unreliable or low-quality. If possible, verify the text with references provided in the source page.
cx-tools-instructions-text5: When you are happy with the result, press {{int:cx-publish-button}} to create the new page.
